alert.note: Alert for North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 13 at 4:06AM MDT until October 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, north winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Limon,and Southern Lincoln County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until noon MDT today. For the Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...For high wind warning, expect damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected.Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. For Freeze Warning, frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
